body: Hey guys! I want to create an AMA so I can get to know you guys a little. Some stuff about me is I play football (one with your hands), im in highschool and im 15. I just recently got promoted to ref and im glad to work with those guys everyday! Ive been on avicus for a year. When I joined avicus,it was called mczone and had gamemodes like skywars etc,... But ask me anything! Thanks.
